InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S3 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 3

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon the same size as the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: Scorpion GT-215 Gatling
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 2

The Scorpion GT-215 is a hydraulically-driven Gatling-type rotary cannon designed to deliver smaller rounds at a very high rate of fire. The Scorpion is designed to shred armor on very fast targets, sacrificing power for absolute saturation of the target area.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S3 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:

Size: 3

InstalledItem.Name: CF-227 Badger Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 2

The CF-227 Badger is Klaus & Werner’s dependable size two repeating laser. Its increased output and high rate of fire make it a solid contender in any fight.

InstalledItem.Name: YellowJacket GT-210 Gatling
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 1

While the GT-210 YellowJacket may be small, it packs a mighty sting. This high-speed ballistic weapon is perfect for targeting smaller, more mobile targets and its DTX-8 ammo supply system almost completely eliminates weapon jams due to bad rounds.

InstalledItem.Name: Gamma (1x Holographic)
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: NV-TAC
Type: Projection 
Attachment Point: Optic
Magnification: 1x
Size: 1

Whether under the blazing sun or on the dark side of a moon, the NV-TAC Gamma projects an easy to see reticle to help ensure your shot finds its mark.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.

InstalledItem.Name: Drake Cutlass Steel Remote Turret
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Turret
Manufacturer: Drake Interplanetary
Size: 2 

This remote-operated turret comes factory-equipped with two Klaus & Werner laser repeaters.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-423 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 4
Missiles: 2xS3

Behring’s MSD-423 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 4 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S3 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Arrester III Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 3

Using cross section targeting to hunt for its prey, the Firestorm Arrester proximity missile makes quick work of enemies caught in the crosshairs.

InstalledItem.Name: Arrester III Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 3

Using cross section targeting to hunt for its prey, the Firestorm Arrester proximity missile makes quick work of enemies caught in the crosshairs.

InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 4
Missiles: 4xS2

Behring’s MSD-442 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 4 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of four S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Tempest II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 2

The Tempest was designed with nothing but annihilation in mind. Utilizing FireStorm Kinetics' targeting technology, this proximity missile locks onto a target's cross section to draw conflicts to a swift conclusion.

InstalledItem.Name: FullStop
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

Featuring proprietary recoil tech, the FullStop shield generator was built to better absorb attacks from a multitude of damage types.

InstalledItem.Name: TurboDrive
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Amon & Reese Co.
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

The TurboDrive is a common military-grade power plant from A&R that slightly favors performance over durability and stealth.

InstalledItem.Name: Arctic
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

Providing the kind of durability that made Aegis products a mainstay with the military, the Arctic is an economic mil-spec cooler capable of withstanding the rigors of combat without sacrificing performance.
